word_mean: 施虐者，施虐狂者，施虐色情者

sentence.Network_en: The man was a sadist who tortured animals and people.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个男人是个施虐狂，喜欢虐待动物和人。

sentence.Network_en: He acted a sadist in that TV play.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在那电视剧中演一个施虐狂.

sentence.Network_en: After all, Clinton was only a minor - league sadist.
sentence.Network_cn: 毕竟, 克林顿只是有一点小小的虐待倾向.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 据说，一个虐待狂（Sadist）也可以用折磨动物的方式表达自己的（性）快感。赶快把你的小狗从他们身边抱走！
心理学专业词汇英语翻译(S) ... sadism 虐待症 sadist 虐待狂者 sadistic element 虐待成分.
引申出施虐狂（sadist）一词。而sade一词似乎也有施虐狂的意思。
* 死灵法师(Rotund'jere)的施虐之心(Sadist)改名为受虐之心(masochism),每被杀死一次恢复100/200/300/400点的魔法. * 现在秀逗魔导.

list.abs: The guards is sadistic beast and their leader is the devil incarnate ., 那些警卫都是残暴的野兽 , 他们的首领是个魔鬼的化身.
sadistic element 虐待成分sadistic personality 施虐色情人格sadness 悲伤
sadist 虐待狂者sadistic element 虐待成分sadistic personality 施虐色情人格
Oral phantasy 口腔幻想Oral sadistic 口腔施虐的Oral sadistic impulse 口腔施虐冲动

entry.def: Sadism is a type of behaviour in which a person obtains pleasure from hurting other people and making them suffer physically or mentally.

example.ex: Psychoanalysts tend to regard both sadism and masochism as arising from childhood deprivation.
example.tran: 精神分析学家往往认为施虐狂和受虐狂都是由于儿时缺乏关爱造成的。

means.word_mean: 1. someone who obtains pleasure from inflicting pain or others
